projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: bodhau nidhāyāvicalaṃ manaśca kuryāt parātmavyatihāram ādau //
tataḥ paraṃ dānavidhau prayogaḥ kāryastathā lokahitonmukhena /
yathā svagātrāṇyapi yācitasya na yogasaṃkocavirūpatā syāt //
mātsaryadoṣopacayāya yat syān na tyāgacittaṃ paribṛṃhayed vā /
tad bodhisattvaḥ katham ādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam /
saṃsmṛtya caryātiśayaṃ munīnāṃ tadunmukhīṃ svāmapi ca pratijñām /
yadā nisṛṣṭo jagate mayāyaṃ kāyo 'pī tattyāgakṛto 'pi dharmaḥ /
bāhye tadā vastuni saṅgacittaṃ na me gajasnānam ivānurūpam //
ahaṃ hi lokārthamidaṃ bibharmi śarīrakaṃ kiṃ bata vastu bāhyam //
tathaiva lokārthasamudyatena svalpo 'pi kāryo na mayā vikalpaḥ /
duḥkhe kṛtaghne satatāśucau ca dehe parasmāyupayujyamāne //
ādhyātmike caiva mahījalādye bāhye mahābhūtagaṇe ca tulye /
idaṃ mamedaṃ na mameti ko 'yam ajñānapaṅkāṅkavidhirmayāpi //
gṛhṇīta gātrāṇyapi me yatheṣṭaṃ mā kārṣurasmin parakīyabuddhim /
yuṣmākameva svamidaṃ kimarthaṃ nātmābhimāno mama kaścidatra //
evaṃ sa dānapratipattiśūraḥ karoti kāye 'pi na jātvapekṣām /
viśuddhakarmā ca hitaṃ pareṣām āyāsaduḥkhena vinā karoti /
bhūyastaraṃ prāpya balaṃ sa dānāt saddharmadānena tataḥ karoti /
bhavāndhakāre bhramatāṃ janānāṃ sūryodayāt spaṣṭataraṃ prakāśam //
tasmāt tadīyaṃ parikarma cittaṃ dānasya kāruṇyapuraḥsarasya //
sattvā mayā cāmiṣasaṃgṛhītāḥ saddharmapātrāṇyapi me bhaveyuḥ //
pānānyapi kleśatṛṣaḥ śamāya lokasya lokārthacaro dadāti //
lābhī kathaṃ syāditi lokanātho yānaṃ mahāyānaratirdadāti //
saṃbuddhavarṇasya ca hemabhāso lajjāmayasyaiva ca bhūṣaṇasya /
sarvajñacakṣuḥpratilabdhaye ca caityeṣu rathyāsu ca dīpamālām //
duḥkhāpagāyāmatiśīghragāyāṃ magnasya lokasya kathaṃ na dadyām /
utkṛtya māṃsāni saśoṇitāni dadāti kāruṇyavaśena nāthaḥ /
bhūmyagnivāyvambuvadeva me syāllokopajīvyaḥ katham eṣa kāyaḥ //
majjānamapyadbhutavīraceṣṭo dadāti lokasya kathaṃ na kuryām /
anviṣya bhogānviṣameṇa nāsau dadāti notpīḍanayā parasya /
na ca praṇīte sati rūkṣadānam adakṣiṇīyā iti vāvamanya /
naivonnatiṃ śīlavate prayacchan viparyayaṃ gacchati netarasmai /
nātmānamutkarṣati naiva nindāṃ karoti so 'nyasya samaprayogaḥ //
na krodhadoṣopahataṃ dadāti naivānutāpaṃ kurute sa dattvā //
na ślāghyamāno vipulaṃ dadāti nāślāghyamāno 'nyataraṃ dadāti /
na yācakānāmupaghātadānaṃ yad vā bhaved vipratipattihetuḥ //
nākāladānaṃ sa dadāti kiṃcid dadāti kāle viṣame 'pi naiva /
nāsau mukhollokanayā dadāti na kīrtiśabdāya na hāsyahetoḥ /
paryāptametacca mameti naivaṃ yadvā vihiṃsāhasitaṃ pareṣām //
sarvajñabhāvāpariṇāmitaṃ vā sagarhitaṃ vā sa dadāti naiva /
tato 'sya tat pāramitābhidhānaṃ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ samupaiti dānam //
dānodbhavaṃ tasya ca puṇyarāśiṃ lokāt samagrādapi piṇḍitāni /
samantatastasya kutaḥ pramāṇaṃ parikṣayo vā satatapravṛtteḥ //
yadakṣayāṇāṃ jagatāṃ hitāya jñānasya hetuśca yadakṣayasya /
traidhātukena kṣayiṇā na tacca saṃlipyate vyomavadambudena //
asmin punaḥ satpuruṣāvadāne dāne nidāne sukhavistārāṇām /
cikīrṣatā yogamanityasaṃjñā bhogeṣu kāryā karuṇā ca loke //
bhogānanityānabhivīkṣamānaḥ sātmyaṃ gatāyāṃ ca tataḥ kṛpāyām /
sa niścayaṃ gacchati dīyate yad etān madīyāṃ na tu yadgṛhe me //
yaddattam asmān na bhayaṃ kadā cid gehe yadasmādbhayamabhyupaiti /
sādhāraṇaṃ rakṣyamatarpakaṃ ca datte tu naite prabhavantyanarthāḥ //
sukhaṃ paratrāpi karoti dattam ihaiva duḥkhaṃ prakarotyadattam /
ulkāsvabhāvaṃ hi dhanaṃ narāṇām atyajyamānaṃ vyasanaṃ dadāti //
adīyamānaṃ nidhanaṃ prayāti nidhānatāṃ yāti hi dīyamānam /
dhanasya niḥsāralaghoḥ sa sāro yaddīyate lokahitonmukhena //
prāyo viyogo hi parigrahebhyo dānādbhavatyabhyudayo yaśaśca //
yaddīyate satpatha eṣa tasmād ato 'nyathā kāpathamāhurāryāḥ //
sa cetpunaryācanake 'pi labdhe dātuṃ na śaknotyatidurbalatvāt /
tenānuneyo madhureṇa sāmnā sa yācakaḥ syānna yathā samanyuḥ //
kāryaśca mātsaryavinigrahāya mohaprahāṇāya ca tena yatnaḥ /
tathā yathā yācanakaḥ kadā cid vaimukhyadīno na tato vyāpaiti //
saṃbodhicittaṃ kuta eva tasya dravye 'pi yo matsaramabhyupaiti /
vāsaḥ sucittasya hi nāsti doṣairambhonidhānasya śavairyathaiva //
tasmāt tyaktvā sarvataḥ sarvadoṣān bodhiprārthī sarvadā sarvadaḥ syāt /
trātuṃ lokānekavīraḥ kva cittaṃ ceṣṭā dainyānūrjiteyaṃ kva caiva //
mūlaṃ dānasyāsya saṃbodhicittaṃ tanna tyājyaṃ ditsatā dānamīdṛk /
svameva śīlaṃ pariśodhyamādau śīlaṃ hi śakterbalamādadhāti //
loke tathā prema niveśayeta svapne 'pi na droharuciryathā syāt /
kurvīta lokasya hitārthakartā kāyena ceṣṭāḥ sujanasya ceṣṭāḥ //
kāryaṃ prayatnena mayā yadasmai tatsādhanena svayameva labdham /
mamaiva daurabalyamidaṃ yadeṣa kleśāsvatantraḥ svahitaṃ na vetti /
svargasya mokṣasya ca satpathebhyo naivoccalet karmapathebhya ebhyaḥ /
samāsataḥ śīlamidaṃ vadanti yaḥ saṃvaraḥ kāyavacomanastaḥ /
kārtsnyena cātraiva yataḥ sa tasmād etānyayatnena viśodhayecca //
yā vāsanā doṣakṛtāsya citte tāṃ cāprayatnena samucchinatti //
maitrīviśeṣānugate ca citte vairānubandheṣu śamam gateṣu /
kurvanti rakṣāṃsyapi cāsya rakṣāṃ na durgatibhyo bhayamabhyupaiti /
anādadānastu parasya bhogān āpnoti bhogānmahataḥ paratra /
prāpnoti lokastutibhiḥ samantāt kīrtiṃ diganteṣu vikīryamāṇam //
na cāpi kaṃ citpramadāsu rāgaṃ karoti mātṛriva vīkṣamāṇaḥ /
ādeyasiddhyā vacanasya sattvān karoti dharmābhimukhān ayatnāt //
divaukasāṃ ca priyatāṃ yadeti satyapriyaścitramidaṃ na tādṛk /
prāyeṇa loko hi guṇairdaridraḥ svenānumānena parānminoti //
evaṃ sa śuddhaprakṛtiḥ krameṇa na śaṅkyate 'nyairna ca śaṅkate 'nyān /
paiśūnyamuktasya bhavatyabhedyā śraddhā ca dharme pratipattisārā //
lokasya ca premṇi virūḍhamūle saivāsya vāggrāhyataratvameti //
ataśca lokāñchataśo vinīya teṣāṃ samāvṛtya ca duḥkhamārgam /
na durgatiṃ gacchati puṇyakarmā dharmo hi rakṣeha paratra caiva //
satyābhidhāne kramate sabuddhiḥ prāpnoti māhātmyam akṛtrimaṃ ca //
praśnānanekānapi caikakāle niḥsaṃśayaṃ vyākurute sa vācā //
citte viśuddhe ca tadāśrayāṇi vākkāyakarmāṇi śucībhavanti /
prayāti rājñāmapi saṃmatatvam adhṛṣyatāṃ ca pratigarvitānām //
hiṃsātmake vigrahasaṃhite vā karmaṇyanāryācarite śaṭhe vā /
na cāsya buddhiḥ kramate kadācin maitrīsukhāsvādaviśeṣalābhāt //
karmasvako 'stīti ca karma pāpaṃ viśasyamāno 'pi karoti naiva //
ārye ca mārge labhate pratiṣṭhāṃ viśeṣagāmitvamato 'bhyupaiti //
satkāyadṛṣṭyuccalitaḥ sa yāti na durgatiṃ hetuparikṣayeṇa /
ko nāma vidvān na samādadīta viśeṣataḥ sattvahitābhilāṣī //
divyābhirāmā manujeṣu saṃpat prakṛṣṭasaukhyaikarasā ca divyā /
śīlādyadi syāt kimivātra citraṃ yasmāt prarohantyapi buddhadharmāḥ //
na durjanakleśaparigrahād vā kurvīta śīlaṃ śabalaprakāram //
śīlaṃ guṇābhyāsavidhiṃ vadanti saṃbodhicitte ca guṇāḥ samagrāḥ /
abhyasyate tacca kṛpāguṇena kāruṇyaśīlaḥ satataṃ tataḥ syāt //
yanniśritaṃ kāmabhave 'pi naiva saṃtiṣṭhate naiva ca rūpadhātau /
niṣevate lokahitāya śīlaṃ taducyate pāramiteti tajjñaiḥ //
tulyākṛtibhyo 'pi pṛthagjanebhyaḥ śīlaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurute narāṇām //
tasmān na durgatibhayena na rājyahetorna svargasaṃpadabhilāṣasamudbhavena /
seveta śīlamamalaṃ na hi tattathā syāllokārthasiddhiparamastu bhajeta śīlam //
saṃmohanīṃ manmathapakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhāṃ caiva vimokṣamāyām /
tasyāṃ na kuryāt kaiva kṣamāyāṃ prayatnamekāntahitakṣamāyām //
seturjalānīva hi roṣadoṣaḥ śreyāṃsi lokasya samāvṛṇoti //
śubhā paratrāpi hite samṛddhirjagaddhitārthasya parā vivṛddhiḥ /
tīvraprakārairapi viprakārairna vikriyāṃ yānti satāṃ manāṃsi /
sa kṣāntidhīreṇa ca mānasena kaṣṭāni saṃdarśayate tapāṃsi /
darponnatiṃ tīrthakṛtāṃ manaḥsu nīcaiḥ kariṣyan hitakāmyayaiva //
naṣṭātmadṛṣṭiṇi parāpakārān na vikriyāṃ yānti guṇānurāgāt //
cakṣuḥ kim ākrośati cakṣuretacchrotrādi vākrośati kiṃ tadādi /
yaivaṃ kṣamā sāyatanānvavekṣā na kṣāntireṣā paramārthatastu //
vaktā vacaścaitadanityameva śrutirvikalpo 'pi ca yo mamāyam /
kartāpakārasya na kaścidasti naivāsti kaścitkriyāte ca yasya /
ityunnate cāvanate ca citte kṣāntiprakarṣasya kuto 'vakāśaḥ //
kuryāṃ kathaṃ kasya ca kāṃ ca pīḍām eṣāpi na kṣāntiratiprakṛṣṭā //
yadyesā matpāpaparikṣayārthaṃ na vīkṣate svāmapi dharmapīḍām /
asmān na kalyāṇataraṃ hi mitram asāvapi kṣāntyupacārā eva //
anityaduḥkhāśuciniḥsvabhāvatā mama kṣamante na tu tadviparyayāḥ /
iyaṃ vipakṣapraśamakṣamā kṣamā dvayapravṛtterna tu pāramārthikī //
kṣamā na caivaṃ samatāṃ sameti yā yataḥ kṣamaivaṃ na vikalpanakṣayā //
svataḥ parasmādubhayādahetuto yathā na bhāvāḥ prabhavanti ke cana /
svataḥ parasmād ubhayād ahetutastathā na bhāvā vibhavanti ke cana //
naṣṭād anaṣṭād ubhayāc na nobhayān na jātu kāryaṃ khalu vidyate kva cit /
tathāpi kāryaṃ samudeti vastuno yetthaṃ kṣamā sā dvayavarjitā kṣamā //
sato 'sato vāsti na janma janmanā vinā nirodho 'pi na kasya cit kva cit /
avāpya yāṃ vyākriyate sahasraśo jinairasau nāma jino bhaviṣyati /
pravartate lokahitakriyāvidhiḥ samāhitasyaiva ca tasya sarvadā //
tathānimittaṃ ca vimokṣaheturdure bhavatyasya yathā kṣiteḥ kham //
tathā pariṣkāravidhau svacetasi prakarṣiṇi jñānabale tathāyuṣi //
avāpya caitadvaśitāmayaṃ dhanaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ akṣiṣṇu parārthasādhanam /
janasya kṛcchreṣu patiṣyataḥ sataḥ sa jāyate dhāraṇakāraṇaṃ vibhuḥ //
atra sthitasya hi bhavanti parārthacittāḥ sarvāḥ; kriyā guṇaphalābharaṇābhirāmāḥ //
asyāṃ hi bhaktirapi yā pravirūḍhamūlā tāmabhyasanti munayo munirājabhāve /
śraddhānuviddhamanasāṃ na hi dharmamārge dṛṣṭo manoratharathasya yato 'kṣabhaṅgaḥ //
sarvaṃsahe kṣāntibale ca rūḍhe sarvādbhutānyārabhate sa śauryāt /
vīryeṇa kāryāntamahābalena yasmāt sa devānapi yātyatītya //
aprāpyarūpaṃ tu na kiṃ cid asti khedānabhijñena parākrameṇa //
ārabdham evotsahate na hīna ārabhya madhyastu viṣādameti /
ekaikamevaṃ yadi bodhicittaṃ prāpyeta saṃbhāravidhiśca śeṣaḥ /
padbhyāṃ atikramya kukūlakalpāṃ kṛtsnāṃ mahīmāyudhasaṃvṛtāṃ vā /
yaddraṣṭum apyutsahate munīndrān pātuṃ śivaṃ dharmarasāyanaṃ vā //
yad vā hitārthaṃ kramate parasya puṇyāni vā lokahitāya cittam /
mahatsu vāmbhaḥsu yathā niṣikto naivodabinduḥ kṣayamabhyupaiti /
saṃbuddhabhāve pariṇāmitasya tathaiva puṇyasya na saṃkṣayo 'sti //
puṇyāni lokasya carācarasyetyevaṃ sa tānyārabhate susattvaḥ //
kalpaṃ tathā naiva ca sattvadhātostenāpi kiṃ cit paripācitaṃ syāt //
śrutvāpi sattvākṣayatāṃ imāṃ yaḥ sattvānaśeṣān vininīṣureva /
śatena bhūyo guṇitena tena puṇyena romāspadasaṃśritena /
ayaṃ mayā puṇyanidhiḥ parārthaṃ saṃceya ityuttamabodhicitte /
sarve 'pi sattvā yadi lokadhātau pratyekabuddhaiḥ sadṛśā bhaveyuḥ /
jñānena tebhyo 'bhyadhikaprabhāvaḥ kṣāntistha eko 'pi hi bodhisattvaḥ //
aśrāntavīryaḥ kuśalaprayoge yallaukike caiva taduttare ca //
tebhyaḥ puṇaścādhika eva dūraṃ ya ekajātipratibaddhabodhiḥ /
ka eva vādo dṛḍhavīryavatsu ye bodhimūle prathamaṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ //
yāyāt kalāṃ so 'pi na bodhimūle sthitasya mārātikṛtāntyajāteḥ //
avyāhatājñaḥ paracittacāre prajñāvabhāsaṃ ca nabho viśālam //
sarveṣu sattveṣu ca tasya mātrā samānahārdā karuṇābhyudeti /
yo bodhicittapraṇayaḥ samaśca kṛpā ca nairātmagatau kṣamā ca /
saṃsārapaṅke yadakhinnatā ca traidhātukasyaiva ca nopalabdhiḥ /
sarvasvadānaṃ na ca tena mānaḥ samagraśikṣasya na śikṣayā ca //
yā deśanā caiva yathāśrutānāṃ jñānaṃ ca dharmānabhilāpyatāyām /
pañcasvabhijñāsu ca yatprabhutvam abhyāsamātrā ca taduttarāyām //
yadṛddhipādeṣvabhinirhṛtatvaṃ paṭvī na cāyāsamayī kriyā ca /
samyakprahāṇeṣu ca yaḥ prayogaḥ śubhāśubhādeva ca yā vimuktiḥ //
yatkauśalaṃ cendriyanirṇayeṣu nirindriyān paśyati yacca dharmān /
mārgasya saṃbhāravimārgaṇaṃ ca na cāsya kiṃ cid gamanaṃ kutaścit //
nimittakarmasvapi na pravartate vitiṣṭhate jñānamaye ca karmaṇi /
kṛpāguṇādyan na jahāti saṃskṛtaṃ na coruvīryo 'pi patatyasaṃskṛte //
vrajantyavandhyā yadaharniśaṃ kriyā guṇairna hāniṃ yadutpaiti mauśalīm /
yaśo viśālam ca sukhaṃ sukhodayaṃ vinītakārpaṇyamanastvamuttamam /
guṇāśca teṣāmiha dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti vīryāditi ko 'tra vismayaḥ //
vīryavyāpāśrayadṛḍhāḥ puruṣā na syād ataḥ ka iva vīryaparaḥ //
yatra kva cana vā deśe saṃsargakleśavarjite /
prajñāparicayasyāyāṃ kālo me na tu nirvṛteḥ /
na hi sattvān anirvāpya svayaṃ nirvātum utsahe //
ekatraiva ca badhnīyād dṛḍham ālambane manaḥ /
hetubhūtā yataḥ kāmāḥ kāmayeta na tān ataḥ //
utplavaṃ manaso dṛṣṭvā prīteratha virajya saḥ /
abhijñā labhate pañca sa ca tatrānugāminīḥ /
vīkṣya vrajati kāruṇyaṃ teṣāṃ vāñcanayā tayā //
dhanado dhanado yathā kva cit kuha cidbrahmavadadbhutadyutiḥ //
garuḍadhvajarājadṛk kva cit kuha ciccaiva halāyudhadyutiḥ //
vāruṇadyutim udvahan kva cit kuha cinmanmathacāruvigrahaḥ //
kva cid eva tapodhanaśriyaṃ vidadhat kāmaviraktamānasaḥ //
manasaḥ parivṛttilāghavaṃ paramaṃ tatra na viśvasedataḥ /
vyatiyāti tu māragocaraṃ tamanarthaṃ praśamayya sarvathā //
calatānugato hi niśrayaḥ sakhaṭuṅkastata eva kathyate //
na hi kiṃ cid udeti kutra cit sadasatsaṃbhavayuktyasaṃbhavāt //
kurute sa ca laukikīṃ kriyāṃ jagadekāntahitānuvartinīm /
kriyāsu sāmarthyaguṇaṃ hi teṣāṃ prajñaiva vistāriṇamādadhāti /
tathaiva kāryāṇi na bhānti loke prajñāviyogena jadīkṛtāni //
guṇāguṇān vetti hi tatsanāthaḥ kleśakṣaye naipuṇametyataśca //
tyāgaṃ parārthaṃ hi vadanti dānaṃ śeṣastu vṛddhyārthamiva prayogaḥ //
naivonnatiṃ nāvanatiṃ prayānti bhaiṣajyavṛkṣā iva nirviklapāḥ //
tataḥ paraṃ kāmiṣu daivateṣu loke 'pi ca dvitrisahasrasaṃkhye /
aiśvaryamāpnoti tataḥ paraṃ ca bhūmiṃ viśodhya prabhavāṃ prabhāyāḥ //
śīlasya śuddhiḥ kuta eva tasya yaḥ prajñayā nāpahṛtāndhakāraḥ /
prāyeṇa śīlāni hi tadviyogād āmarṣadoṣaiḥ kaluṣīkriyante //
nātmārthamapyasti tu yasya śīlaṃ prājñasya tasyāsti kathaṃ parārtham /
yo dṛṣṭadoṣo bhavabandhanānāṃ lokān samastāṃstata ujjihīrṣuḥ //
prajñāvipakṣairhṛdi soparāge kṣamāguṇaḥ kena dhṛtiṃ labheta /
prajñānvitānāṃ tu parāpakārāḥ kṣamāguṇāḥ sthairyakarā bhavanti /
niṣkevalaṃ vīryamapi śramāya prajñāsanāthasya tu tasya kārye /
yasmāt paraṃ sūkṣamataraṃ na kiṃ cid yannaipuṇānāṃ paramaḥ prakarṣaḥ /
prajñānirudyogamaterhi dṛṣṭirnāyāti śuddhiṃ tadṛte na śīlam /
prājñastu doṣādbhayamīkṣamāṇaḥ sukhānubaddhaṃ ca sukhaṃ guṇebhyaḥ /
naiṣkāraṇorjasvalayā ca vṛttyā parārthacaryāsu samaṃ samantāt //
sāmānyamartheṣu ca darśayitvā premṇā vaśīkṛtya manāṃsi teṣām /
bhayāni sarvāṇi hi doṣajāni prajñā na doṣaiḥ sahavāsameti /
na tatra bhūyaḥ karaṇīyam asti yatra prabhā sā balatāmupaiti /
yugāntakālānalasaṃhṛte hi loke na dagdhavyakathāḥ prathante //
saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti sukhena śikṣā śīlāya cittapraśamāya caiva /
prajñābalaṃ dīptataraprabhāvaṃ nālaṃ prasoḍhuṃ sabalo 'pi māraḥ /
prajñāṃśavo vibhramayānti cakṣurna draṣṭum īśo hi yataḥ sa eva //
adhīrasātmyaṃ bhayaviklavaṃ vā mūḍhocitaṃ śokaparigrahaṃ vā /
dīneṣu kārpaṇyamalīmasatvaṃ kṛtāspadaṃ rāgiṣu cāpalaṃ vā /
avāpya yasmān muniyauvarājyaṃ samaṃ samantād visṛtātmabhāvaḥ /
lokasya duḥkhaṃ praśamatyayatnād rajo mahāmegha iva pravṛṣṭaḥ //
ko vismayo vātra sutapriyāyā mātuḥ samīyādyadiyaṃ vibhūtiḥ //
paryāyacitraṃ ca vimokṣamārgaṃ tattacca lokasya hitopapādi /
na yadvirūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ vrajanti prajñā guṇāmātyasanāthatā sā //
parasya duḥkheṣu parā dayā ca na śokabhārālasatāṃ gatā ca //
ko nāma lokasya parārthasādhurduḥkhaikahetūni tamāṃsi hanyāt /
avyāhatā jñānaśayāśayeṣu prajñā na cet syādatisūryādīptiḥ //
tatprāptaye śrutam aśītivikalpacitraṃ saṃceyam āśrayasahaṃ gurumabhyupetya /
alpaśruto 'ndha iva vetti na bhāvanāyā mārgaṃ vicintayati kāni ca tadvihīnaḥ /
tasmācchrutaṃ prati yateta tadāśrayā hi prajñā samudbhavati cintanabhāvanābhyām //
prajñāvivṛddhimabhitaḥ prayateta nityaṃ dhyānena tadguṇavivṛddhikareṇa caiva //
tābhyāṃ samudbhavati hi prabhavo guṇānāṃ prajñāprabhāsamudayo 'gnirivāraṇībhyāṃ //
tairāvṛto na hi vibhātyudayasthito 'pi toyāvalambijaladāntaritaḥ śaśīva //
mithyāvikalpapaṭutā vitathā ca dṛṣṭirmohāya tatpraśamanāya tu tadvipakṣāḥ //
skandheṣu sāyatanadhātuṣu satyayuktyor; hetudbhaveṣu śucayānavinirṇaye ca /
dharmeṣu kauśalamaśeṣata eva yacca prajñāprayogaviṣayo 'ṣṭavikalpa eṣaḥ //
niḥsāraphenanicayairaviśeṣi rūpaṃ tisro 'pi budbudalavā iva vedanāśca /
saṃjñāpi kāmaguṇaviprasṛtān satṛṣṇān bālān mṛgāniva vilobhayate marīciḥ //
saṃskārajātirapi tulyaguṇā kadalyā vijñānato 'pi na ca yuktatarāsti māyā /
nātmā tadīyamapi cātra na kiṃ cid asti saṃghāta eṣa vividhāśūcisaṃnidhānaḥ /
bālān pralambhayata eva ca sattvasaṃjñā svacchandaceṣṭa iva yantravidhau suyukte //
ātmā na cakṣurapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāt tadvan na cakṣuṣi na cātra yathaiva cakṣuḥ /
ādhyātmikāyatanaśeṣam aśeṣam evam ātmīyavastuviṣayo 'pi ca tadvivekī //
bāhyeṣu dhātuṣu śarīrasamāśritānāṃ nālpo 'pi lakṣaṇavirodhakṛto 'sti bhedaḥ /
vijñānadhāturapi ca kṣaṇikaḥ sa nātmā tasmātparo 'pi ca nabhaḥkusumaiḥ samānaḥ //
ityetadudbhavati kevalameva duḥkhaṃ tṛṣṇāvimūḍhamanaso vigmāttu tasyāḥ /
śāntiḥ parā bhavati tarṣaharastu mārgaḥ śīlaṃ samādhipariśuddhatayā ca dṛṣṭiḥ //
tattatpratītya bhavatīti viśuddhadṛṣṭirnāstyasti veti samupaiti sa naiva kiṃ cit /
māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ //
āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi //
tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt //
hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ //
svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam //
lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva //
nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke //
tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ //
sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam //
cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam //
prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi //
